thread.title: CHGT Consults on Authoritative 3D Printing Book
thread.title_full: CHGT Consults on Authoritative 3D Printing Book

title: CHGT Consults on Authoritative 3D Printing Book
text:
CHGT Consults on Authoritative 3D Printing Book October 22, 2015 08:40 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
HOUSTON--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Changing Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB: CHGT) and CEO Marco Valenzuela recently consulted on the writing of a significant new 3D printing text, giving the company valuable market exposure and prestige. Meanwhile, the company also reports its new 3D printing portal, 6d3d.com , has maintained a red-hot pace following its launch, as site visits and usage continue to exceed projections . 
3D Technology in Fine Art and Craft, by author and master sculptor Bridgette Mongeon , hit stores in September and is currently available via Amazon and other dealers nationwide. Valenzuela, with more than a decade of solid experience in 3D modeling and animation, lent his expertise and images of his work to the text and an accompanying website . Both aim to teach artists on how to use technology to bring their creations to life, an area of considerable familiarity for Valenzuela. 
“These are great resources for artists who could be future 6d3d.com portal users,” Valenzuela said. “My role down the line will be to act as an oracle – a virtual knowledge base – to answer questions from readers and website visitors on how to best utilize 3D printing. We’re honored to lend our expertise to this effort, which could grow the global 3D printing world and our portal, as well as enhance CHGT’s reputation throughout the community.” 
For more information on CHGT, please visit www.changingtechno.com . 
For more information on 6 th Dimension Technologies, visit http://www.6d3d.com . 
About Changing Technologies, Inc. 
Changing Technologies, Inc. (CHGT) is an emerging technology company focused on developing innovative concepts to bring to consumers. It recently created a new subsidiary — 6 th Dimension Technologies — to pursue additional growth areas and market needs in the booming 3D printing sector. A forward-thinking company working to be at the forefront of the next generation of consumer-based technology, CHGT is positioning itself to leverage global demand for the latest technological advances and services the company offers. Changing Technologies, Inc. is in the cutting-edge technology sphere alongside companies like Voxelijet AG ( VJET ), Arcam AB ( AMAVF ), and ExOne Co. ( XONE ). 
FOLLOW US: facebook.com/changingtechnologies
